医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
微型装置有助于提高脊髓损伤患者细胞疗法的安全性和有效性由麻省理工学院和新加坡-麻省理工学院研究与技术联盟的科学家制造的微型设备可用于提高脊髓损伤患者细胞疗法的安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Tiny-device-could-help-improve-safety-effectness-of-cell-therapy-for-spinal-cord-injury-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Tiny-device-could-help-improve-safety-effectness-of-cell-therapy-for-spinal-cord-injury-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c0a5a4a-b175-4079-9e34-3d27b95f91e5 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:42:16 -0500 Tiny device could help improve safety, effectiveness of cell therapy for spinal cord injury patients
结合使用血栓破坏剂和血液稀释剂对缺血性中风患者没有任何好处根据今天在美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议上公布的初步最新科学成果，对缺血性中风（血栓引起的中风）患者除了服用抗凝药物外，给予血液稀释剂并没有改善 90 天后的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Combining-clot-busters-and-blood-thinners-shows-no-advantage-for-people-with-ischemic-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Combining-clot-busters-and-blood-thinners-shows-no-advantage-for-people-with-ischemic-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f53e1fd8-ab7c-4149-b8ba-c8cee994be4b Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:17:00 -0500 Combining clot busters and blood thinners shows no advantage for people with ischemic strokes
远程皮肤病学研究揭示肤色诊断差距，人工智能提供改进专科医生和普通医生在诊断不同肤色的皮肤病方面存在显着差距，深度学习的帮助提高了准确性，但也凸显了差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Teledermatology-study-exposes-skin-tone-diagnosis-gaps-AI-offers-improvement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Teledermatology-study-exposes-skin-tone-diagnosis-gaps-AI-offers-improvement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd5e6a27-961d-4b58-a4d2-d827a6798866 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:17:00 -0500 Teledermatology study exposes skin tone diagnosis gaps, AI offers improvement
CDKL5缺乏症的新治疗靶点被发现弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的科学家们发现了 CDKL5 缺乏症 (CDD) 的新治疗靶点，CDD 是最常见的遗传性癫痫类型之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-treatment-target-found-for-CDKL5-deficiency-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-treatment-target-found-for-CDKL5-deficiency-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2a799d1-f1fd-4e3c-8ff3-6386077a4687 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:08:20 -0500 New treatment target found for CDKL5 deficiency disorder
体温波动与抑郁严重程度有关研究将较高的体温和减少的温度波动与抑郁症严重程度的增加联系起来，表明温度调节是一个潜在的治疗目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Body-Temperature-fluctuations-tied-to-depression-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Body-Temperature-fluctuations-tied-to-depression-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0a860b3-2317-49a2-a30a-4c41784eaf52 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:06:00 -0500 Body temperature fluctuations tied to depression severity
韦恩州立大学研究人员获得国防部 140 万美元拨款用于前列腺癌研究韦恩州立大学的一组研究人员从美国国防部获得了为期三年的 140 万美元资助，用于“细胞色素 c 乙酰化驱动前列腺癌侵袭性和瓦尔堡效应”的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Wayne-State-researchers-secure-2414-million-DoD-grant-for-prostate-cancer-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Wayne-State-researchers-secure-2414-million-DoD-grant-for-prostate-cancer-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48b0b5f0-fa70-4dd3-8309-3db7b1b72002 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 22:03:40 -0500 Wayne State researchers secure $1.4 million DoD grant for prostate cancer study
新指南旨在改进生物场治疗试验的报告同行评审的《综合与补充医学杂志》(JICM) 中提出了报告生物场疗法临床试验的新指南。生物场疗法 (BFT)，例如外部气功、治愈触摸、灵气和治疗触摸，是一组相关的综合医学干预措施，治疗师将双手放在客户的身体上或上方以刺激康复和健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-guidelines-aim-to-improve-reporting-of-biofield-therapy-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-guidelines-aim-to-improve-reporting-of-biofield-therapy-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63a0fef8-292e-4ebb-aa14-ea35c86273c1 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:58:27 -0500 New guidelines aim to improve reporting of biofield therapy trials
研究发现咀嚼烟草会增加中风和癌症风险咀嚼烟草会显着增加中风和多种癌症的风险，这对全球 2.7 亿使用者的健康产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Chewing-tobacco-linked-to-higher-中风-and-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Chewing-tobacco-linked-to-higher-中风-and-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05ea1270-3375-4caa-9b4d-af8c789a8906 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:52:00 -0500 Chewing tobacco linked to higher stroke and cancer risk, study finds
研究表明勃起功能障碍药物与降低阿尔茨海默病风险之间存在联系根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》2024 年 2 月 7 日在线期刊上发表的一项研究，用于治疗勃起功能障碍的药物也可能与降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-shows-link- Between-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-and-reduced-risk-of-Alzheimere28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-shows-link- Between-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-and-reduced-risk-of-Alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee2c6aa7-3bed-40ca-92d8-e5ebe3450147 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:50:58 -0500 Study shows link between erectile dysfunction drugs and reduced risk of Alzheimer’s
减少老年患者不必要的检查或治疗当医生要求一位 80 岁的男性进行例行前列腺检查时 -；正如医生经常做的那样——；电子健康记录上弹出了一个引人注目的黄色警报，其中包含可怕的警告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Reducing-unnecessary-testing-or-treatments-in-older-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Reducing-unnecessary-testing-or-treatments-in-older-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=309dbf98-a231-4ddd-8e81-447c49d765ad Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:44:40 -0500 Reducing unnecessary testing or treatments in older patients
